colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS, ,RJE NYID KYI GANG NAS CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS TSE 'PHEL GLING GI TSOGS MANG GI ZHAL 'DON DU MDO CHOG BSDUS PA'I THOG MTHA' PAR GSUM DU DAG 'DON KA SKONG 'DI LTAR GYIS SHIG PA'I ZHAL BKOD MDZAD PA ZHAL SLOB 'GAS ZIN @034B THOR BRIS 'DUG PA, PHYIS SU YAB RJE DAM PA DE NYID KYI BKA' DBANG THA SHAL BA MKHAN PO'I LAS 'DZIN ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES ZHUS DGANG DA KHA BSKONG MTSAMS SBYOR PHRAN BUS BRGYAN TE KHRIGS CHAGS SU DKOD PA 'DIS KYANG DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA'I THUGS KYI BZHE DANG DGONGS MTHA' DAG GEGS MED LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
